table.Name: wcms_EmailSent
table.Title: dm_outbox
table.SQL_SELECT_LIST: declare @totalItem int, @totalPage int set @totalItem = ( select count(0) from wcms_EmailSent where EmailSent_SiteID = @siteID { AND EmailSent_Name @Search:EmailSent_Name } { AND EmailSent_From @Search:EmailSent_From } ) if (@pageSize < 1) set @pageSize = 10 set @totalPage = ceiling(@totalItem * 1.0 / @pageSize) if (@pageIndex < 1) set @pageIndex = 1 if (@pageIndex > @totalPage) set @pageIndex = @totalPage select [EmailSent_ID] ,[EmailType] ,[EmailSent_From] ,[EmailSent_To] ,DATEADD(hour, {@TIMEZONE}, EmailSent_Date) as [EmailSent_Date] ,[EmailSent_Subject] ,0 as [locked] from ( select top (@pageIndex * @pageSize) ROW_NUMBER() OVER(ORDER BY {@Sort} {@Asc}) as [num] ,[EmailSent_ID] ,(case EmailSent_Type when 1 then 'Contact' when 2 then 'Sales' when 3 then 'Booking' when 4 then 'A Require from User' when 6 then 'Happy Birthday' else '' end) as [EmailType] ,'' + EmailSent_Name + ' (' + EmailSent_From + ')' as [EmailSent_From] ,case when len(EmailSent_To) > 51 then SUBSTRING(EmailSent_To, 0, 50) + '...' else EmailSent_To end as [EmailSent_To] ,[EmailSent_Date] ,[EmailSent_Subject] from wcms_EmailSent where EmailSent_SiteID = @siteID { AND EmailSent_Name @Search:EmailSent_Name } { AND EmailSent_From @Search:EmailSent_From } ) tb where [num] between (@pageIndex - 1 ) * @pageSize + 1 and @pageIndex * @pageSize select @totalItem, @pageSize, @pageIndex
table.SQL_LOAD_EDIT: select [EmailSent_ID] ,EmailSent_Name + ' (' + EmailSent_From + ')' as [EmailSent_From] ,[EmailSent_To] ,[EmailSent_Date] ,[EmailSent_Subject] ,[EmailSent_Message] from wcms_EmailSent where EmailSent_ID = @editID
table.SQL_DELETE: delete from wcms_EmailSent where EmailSent_ID = @delID select 1
